div.p: Defines how a match URL should be used when processing a transaction
This value set has an inline code system http://hl7.org/fhir/transaction-processing-mode, which defines the following codes:

tr.td: If a matching resource is found, then ignore the resource and do not process it as part of the transaction (and return the matching resource information in the transaction response)
If a matching resource is found, then update it with this resource, otherwise create a new one
If a resource matching the information provided is found, delete it. If no matching resource is found, the transaction fails

description.value: Defines how a match URL should be used when processing a transaction

definition.value: If a matching resource is found, then ignore the resource and do not process it as part of the transaction (and return the matching resource information in the transaction response)
If a matching resource is found, then update it with this resource, otherwise create a new one
If a resource matching the information provided is found, delete it. If no matching resource is found, the transaction fails
